featured.name: Enterprise ERP Framework
featured.description: Low-code Enterprise Resource Planning platform that dynamically generates complete web applications from JSON configurations.
featured.long_description: Designed and developed a comprehensive low-code ERP platform enabling rapid business application deployment without extensive coding. Features AI-powered SQL generation, 20+ dashboard components, and dynamic form builders.
highlights: AI-powered assistant for SQL query generation
Dynamic form builder with 15+ field types

featured.name: WowPay Payment Platform
featured.description: Multi-biller payment aggregation platform for UAE enabling bill payments and mobile recharges across 20+ service providers.
featured.long_description: Comprehensive bill payment platform enabling UAE residents to pay utility bills (DEWA, AADC, Etisalat, Du, Salik, Nol) through a unified web interface with real-time order tracking.

featured.name: MBME Payment Gateway
featured.description: Merchant portal and back-office management system for payment gateway with real-time transaction monitoring.
featured.long_description: Comprehensive merchant portal enabling merchants to onboard, manage payment accounts, monitor transactions in real-time, generate reports, and configure payment gateway settings.

featured.name: Bigdate Event Builder
featured.description: AI-powered no-code event website builder platform with GPT chatbot enabling website creation through conversation.
featured.long_description: No-code platform with AI chatbot enabling users to create event websites through natural conversation. Features 3 microservices architecture, visual editor, and real-time collaboration.
